title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard

Overview
Experience the best of both worlds with the Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. It blends the tactile click of a blue mechanical switch with the smooth feel of a membrane for satisfying keystrokes, reliable performance, and quieter operation. Built with an aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame and rated IP32 for water resistance, it’s ready for intense gaming sessions and everyday use alike.

Key Features
- Hybrid Mechanical Switches: Combines the tactile click of blue switches with a smooth membrane for precise, responsive, and comfortable typing and gaming.
- OLED Smart Display: View in-game info, system stats, Discord messages, and even custom GIFs at a glance without tabbing out.
- Dynamic Per-Key RGB: Customize vibrant, per-key RGB lighting for effects, game integrations, and profiles.
- Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest: Detachable, full palm support for long-lasting comfort.
- Durable Build: Aircraft-grade aluminum alloy top plate with IP32 water resistance to guard against accidental spills.
- Cross-Platform Compatibility: Works with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation systems.
- Easy Setup: Requires an available USB port.

Specifications
- Switch Type: Hybrid mechanical (tactile blue click + smooth membrane)
- Display: OLED smart display with customizable content
- Illumination: Per-key RGB (dynamic effects supported)
- Frame: Aircraft-grade aluminum alloy
- Wrist Rest: Premium magnetic, full palm support
- Water Resistance: IP32
- Dimensions (approx.):
  - Metric: 900 x 300 x 4 mm
  - Imperial: 35.43 x 11.81 x 0.16 in
- Use Cases: Gaming and general productivity

What’s in the Box
- SteelSeries Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
- Magnetic wrist rest
- Quick start guide

Why You’ll Love It
The Apex 5 delivers mechanical-like precision and feedback with the comfort and value of a hybrid design. Add in the OLED Smart Display for on-the-fly info, per-key RGB customization, and a sturdy aluminum build, and you’ve got a versatile keyboard that elevates both gaming and daily computing.
